content: Total revenue for the fourth quarter of 2022 was $13.8 million, a 1% increase from the fourth quarter of 2021 and a 10% increase over the third quarter of 2022. Genesys HTA was $4 million or 29% of total revenue in the fourth quarter of 2022, down slightly from $4.1 million in the fourth quarter of 2021, and Symphion was $3.1 million or 22% of total revenue in the fourth quarter of 2022, up slightly from $3 million in the fourth quarter of 2021.
